quote.title: Learn by Explaining to Others
quote.quote: If you can't explain something in simple terms, you don'tunderstand it.
quote.author: Richard Feyman

step1.title: Sign up
step1.description: Register an account on our website, head to the blog page and begin writing! We will be releasing monthly kuma awards to outstanding articles!

step2.title: Join our discord channel
step2.description: Participate in heated discussions with other kuma members in our discord channel. In discord create your own threads in the project forum to seek collaboration!

step3.title: Join events
step3.description: Tune in for updates on in-person and virtual events. Networking events, hackathons, paper-studying session, and more!
